mapper.select: SELECT u.id userId, u.username, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.created_at createdAt, u.sex sex, u.dept_id deptId, u.last_login_time lastLoginTime, u.updated_at updatedAt, u.description, u.avatar, u.theme, u.is_tab isTab, d.dept_name deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name) roleName FROM admin_user u LEFT JOIN admin_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN admin_user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN admin_role r ON r.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.id
